relay_switched:
Switched to relay mode.
Room ID: {roomId}
mc_connect_guide: Connect from Minecraft with the following command:
speclisten_enabled: Spectator can listen to other gamemode players
speclisten_disabled: Spectator cannot listen to other gamemode players
specdim_common: Spectator's VC set to common in all dimensions
help_list:
Command list:
 !help - show help
 !name - check your VC GamerTag
help_host:
Host-only command : 
 !config - Show current settings
 !lang - !lang <ja/en/zn> lang change
 !dis - !dis <Number> set max distance
 !pvc - !pvc <§atrue§r/§cfalse§r> enable/disable proximity voice chat
help_host_2:
!output - !output <§atrue§r/§cfalse§r> enable/disable information output to minecraft chat
 !verify - !verify <§atrue§r/§cfalse§r> enable/disable verify code
 !spectator - !spectator <§atrue§r/§cfalse§r> separate spectator and VC
help_spec:
Settings effective only when "spectator" is true : 
 !specListen - !specListen <§atrue§r/§cfalse§r> Spectator can listen to other gamemode players
 !specDim - !specDim <§atrue§r/§cfalse§r> Spectator`s VC separated by dimension
